projects.name: claude-howto
projects.description: A visual, example-driven guide to Claude Code — from basic concepts to advanced agents, with copy-paste templates that bring immediate value

projects.name: skills
projects.description: Supercharge your AI agents/bots with reusable skills

projects.name: llm-cli
projects.description: A wrapper of llama.cpp for easier use: find, download a model from Hugging Face, chat, get info, benchmark it

projects.name: voice-cast
projects.description: Your words, any voice. Voice cloning and text-to-speech with multiple TTS engines — clone any voice from a short audio sample

projects.name: mdoctor
projects.description: Keep your Mac healthy — comprehensive CLI to diagnose, clean, fix, and benchmark macOS

projects.name: git-auto-switch
projects.description: A CLI tool for managing multiple GitHub accounts with automatic identity switching based on workspace folders

projects.name: music-cli
projects.description: A command-line music player for coders — background daemon with radio streaming, local MP3s, and AI-generated music

projects.name: slide-speech
projects.description: Automate presentations — play synced audio for each slide of a PDF or PPTX, timed to each audio file's duration

projects.name: cc-context-stats
projects.description: Know your zone. Ship with confidence — real-time Claude Code context usage monitoring across three operational zones

projects.name: inbash
projects.description: Bootstrap your dev environment in a single command

projects.name: vscode-markdown-preview
projects.description: Clean, minimal markdown preview for VS Code inspired by Zed — syntax highlighting, Mermaid diagrams, KaTeX math, and interactive features
